title: Significance of the Kaaba on mosque architecture

content.prompt: The Kaaba proved influential on later Islamic architecture because it

choices.label: inspired the enclosed cubic interiors of all mosques
serves as the orientation for the qibla wall in all mosques
replicates the house of the Prophet Muhammad at Medina

unit.text: 7: West and Central Asia, 500 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 7.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in West and Central Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain the influence of a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) on other artistic production within or across cultures.
